channel.description: Recent content in Jonathan Rhodes EPK on Jonathan Rhodes

item.description: Contact & Social Media Email: me@jonathanrhodes.nl Website: www.jonathanrhodes.nl Spotify: https://jonathanrhodes.nl/landing/spotify YouTube: https://jonathanrhodes.nl/landing/youtube Instagram: https://jonathanrhodes.nl/landing/instagram Facebook: https://jonathanrhodes.nl/landing/facebook Bio English Jonathan Rhodes (NL) writes and performs songs with little pretence. Drawn from Dutch clay, he’s a city boy with a secret dream of a simpler life. Pulling inspiration from the rich American music tradition, his sound leans on roots and blues with a hint of gospel.

item.title: Jonathan Rhodes Release EPK
item.description: Jonathan RhodesTime & Money Release type: single Track title: Time & Money Artist name: Jonathan Rhodes Release date: August 20th 2020 ISRC: QZHNB2091399 UPC: 195398371655 -- Audio (download .wav) Jonathan Rhodes · Time & Money -- Video (download 4K .mp4) Press release Dutch roots formation Jonathan Rhodes Band uncovers American history with new single Time & Money Groningen, NL - August 20th 2020 Five months after the release of their debut single Blind, Dutch roots formation Jonathan Rhodes Band release their second single Time & Money.
